channel.title: CVE Feed for SUSE -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SUSE -- all products

item.title: CVE-2015-0796|2024-08-06T04:26:10.187Z -- suse -- open%20build%20service
item.description: In open buildservice 2.6 before 2.6.3, 2.5 before 2.5.7 and 2.4 before 2.4.8 the source service patch application could generate non-standard files like symlinks or device nodes, which could allow buildservice users to break of confinement or cause denial of service attacks on the source service.

item.title: CVE-2012-0433|2024-08-06T18:23:31.003Z -- suse -- crowbar
item.description: The install-chef-suse.sh script shipped with crowbar before 2012-10-02 is creating files containing confidential data with insecure permissions, allowing local users to read confidential data.

item.title: CVE-2011-0467|2024-08-06T21:51:09.081Z -- suse -- suse%20studio%20onsite
item.description: A vulnerability in the listing of available software of SUSE Studio Onsite, SUSE Studio Onsite 1.1 Appliance allows authenticated users to execute arbitrary SQL statements via SQL injection. Affected releases are SUSE Studio Onsite: versions prior to 1.0.3-0.18.1, SUSE Studio Onsite 1.1 Appliance: versions prior to 1.1.2-0.25.1.
